body:
The forums needs a new game, so here it is!

So what you do is you say 3 clues about a place in the world (don't make it really hard) and then you guess what the place is…

Example:

First Person

1. A city in the USA
2. East Coast
3. Big Apple

Second Person

New York, USA

1. One of the biggest tourist attractions is here
2. Croissants, Crepes, Snails
3. The capital of France

And on and on… :D

So my clues are

1. One of the biggest tourist attractions is here
2. Croissants, Crepes, Snails
3. The capital of France
body_tagged:
The forums needs a new game, so here it is!

So what you do is you say 3 clues about a place in the world (don't make it really hard) and then you guess what the place is…

Example:

First Person

1. A city in the USA
2. East Coast
3. Big Apple

Second Person

New York, USA

1. One of the biggest tourist attractions is here
2. Croissants, Crepes, Snails
3. The capital of France

And on and on… :D

So my clues are

1. One of the biggest tourist attractions is here
2. Croissants, Crepes, Snails
3. The capital of France
title: (GAME) Guess the place!

replies.body:
Paris!

1). The 11th biggest city in the U.S.
2). Considered the "Live Music Capitol of the World"
3). Is a High-Tech City
replies.body_tagged:
Paris!

2). Considered the "Live Music Capitol of the World"
3). Is a High-Tech City

replies.body:
Austin?

1. There is a bridge there that is famous
2. Biggest city in it's country, but it's not the capital
3. It is fall/autumn there now

Edit: It was Sydney, you are correct!

replies.body:
- Portuguese and Persian invasions prior to becoming the capital of this nation.
- Was a key area for trading in the Persian Gulf.
- As World War I started, this city was used as a military base for the Mesopotamian Campaign.
